stories.text: I have some developers that work for me out of the Ukraine. I need a good way to check if they internet is still up for them so I can hope my slack messages are getting to them.
stories.title: Ask HN: Does anyone have a good way to check on internet availability in Ukraine

stories.text:
In the past, many startups validated their business by throwing a simple landing page online. I’m talking about 2006-2017. To me it seems that nowadays this would in most instances not work. With the amount of websites existing and Google results dominance I feel that a landing page alone wouldn’t validate much.

For example Flexport. Founder put up a landing page with I believe some Google Adwords and had great results.

What do you think?
stories.title: Thoughts on Landing Pages as Validation?
The DMC DeLorean Is Coming Back as an Electric Vehicle
